Posted By: Rob
Hey guys,



I just want one OJ card for my collection right now.  It doesn't have to be a good example.  I am really looking for a low grade or Authentic common to buy for a friendly price.  Please let me know, and/or email me scans/prices.



Thanks - Rob

Posted By: Fred C
Rob,

Do yourself a favor.  Make sure that the example you obtain is "full card", not a card with the ad trimmed off the bottom.  Also, try to make sure that it is not skinned.  I've seen a lot of examples availble that may be inexpensive but they are also not great candidates to be a type card in a personal collection.  Also, pick an OJ that has a clear and clean (dark) image.  You'll be much happier with a nice example than a poor one.  You may have to pay a few dollars more but it will be worth it in the end.  Good luck!
